import { TypographyTailwind } from "./typography-tailwind";
import { TypographyTokens } from "./typography-tokens";
import { bodyTokens, titleTokens } from "./types";

# Typography

## Tokens

### Title placeholders

<TypographyTokens tokens={titleTokens} />

### Body placeholders

<TypographyTokens tokens={bodyTokens} />

## Usage in CSS

Whenever you want to apply this style to text, you can use the corresponding placeholder.

```css
.myBodyClass {
  font-size: var(--body-m);
  font-weight: var(--fw-regular);
  font-family: var(--ff-base);
}

.myTitleClass {
  font-size: var(--title-m);
  font-weight: var(--fw-medium);
  font-family: var(--ff-base);
}
```

## Usage in TailwindCSS

Whenever you want to apply a typography style to the block element, you can use the corresponding className.

<TypographyTailwind />
